entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:12 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:12 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:12 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
